inclusion.criterion: Karyotype diagnosis compatible with Turner syndrome.
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: No treatment with estrogen, androgen or growth hormone exceeding twelve months.
inclusion.label: not_met
inclusion.evidence: treating with GH since 6 months ago without estrogen therapy

inclusion.criterion: Bone age less than or equal to 12 years.
inclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Prior treatment with estrogen, androgen, or growth hormone for more than twelve months.
exclusion.label: not_met
exclusion.evidence: treating with GH since 6 months ago without estrogen therapy

notes: Patient has Turner syndrome, is being treated with GH for short stature and developmental delay. She is obese and mentally retarded.
